subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Football
Labor
lead_paragraph: Sam Kagel was a mediator and arbitrator whose career settling labor disputes ranged from the rough-and-rowdy San Francisco docks of the 1930s to the N.F.L. fields of the early 1980s.
snippet: Sam Kagel was a mediator and arbitrator whose career settling labor disputes ranged from the rough-and-rowdy San Francisco docks of the 1930s to the N.F.L. fields of the early 1980s.
